rdm.name: Zenodo
rdm.description: Zenodo is a general-purpose open-access repository developed under the European OpenAIRE program and operated by CERN.

rdm.name: CaltechDATA
rdm.description: CaltechDATA is an institutional research data repository that shares and preserves the accomplishments of Caltech researchers.

rdm.name: TU Wien Research Data
rdm.description: TU Wien Research Data is the institutional research data repository for TU Wien, the technical university of Vienna, Austria.

rdm.name: TU Graz Repository
rdm.description: TU Graz Repository is the institutional research data repository for TU Graz, the technical university of Graz, Austria.

rdm.name: KTH Data Repository
rdm.description: The KTH data repository contains information about KTH research data and related research output.

rdm.name: Materials Cloud Archive
rdm.description: The Materials Cloud Archive is an open and moderated repository for research data relevant to computational materials science.

rdm.name: Prism
rdm.description: Prism is an institutional repository for the research and scholarly output of Northwestern University.

ils.name: TIND ILS
ils.description: Integrated library system based on Invenio framework, used by multiple institutions worldwide.

ils.name: RERO ILS
ils.description: Library system for the RERO network of Western Switzerland libraries.

ils.name: NTNU Library
ils.description: Special collections at the NTNU University library with regional, national and international importance.

ils.name: International Telecommunication Union
ils.description: The ITU library collections include all ITU publications and documents.

ils.name: United Nations Library Vienna
ils.description: The United Nations Office at Vienna library system.

ils.name: World Food Programme
ils.description: The World Food Programme library system for the world's largest humanitarian agency.

framework_v3.name: INSPIRE-HEP
framework_v3.description: High-Energy Physics information system, serving the particle physics community since 1974.

framework_v3.name: CERN Open Data
framework_v3.description: Discover open Research datasets and software of LHC experiments. Visualise events and run and your own analysis.

framework_v3.name: CaltechAUTHORS
framework_v3.description: CaltechAUTHORS contains research publications by Caltech faculty and other Caltech researchers.

framework_v3.name: B2SHARE
framework_v3.description: Reliable and trustworthy way for researchers to store and share small-scale research data.

framework_v3.name: HEPData
framework_v3.description: The Durham High Energy Physics Database (HEPData) has been built up over the past four decades as a unique open-access repository for scattering data from experimental particle physics.

framework_v3.name: Aristotle University Digital Library
framework_v3.description: Digital library holding rare books, archival material, grey literature and institutional publications.

framework_v3.name: EPFL Infoscience
framework_v3.description: The scientific information portal of the École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL).

v1.name: CERN Document Server
v1.description: CERN official repository for publications, articles, reports and multimedia content in HEP.

v1.name: DESY PUBDB
v1.description: The DESY Publication database (pubdb) contains references for scientific publications as well as open access to many of the corresponding full texts.

v1.name: GSI Institutional Repository
v1.description: The GSI Institutional Repository is the portal to the references of the scientific publications and to the open access full texts of the GSI scientists.

v1.name: JuSER
v1.description: Jülich Shared Electronic Resources (JuSER) lists scientific publications by employees of Forschungszentrum Jülich.

v1.name: RWTH Publications
v1.description: RWTH Publications is a central database that documents RWTH Aachen University's scientific performance.

v1.name: RERO DOC
v1.description: Digital library of RERO, the library Network of Western Switzerland. Created to promote, preserve and provide public access to the grey literature.
